timeline.bodyText:
Could we use Logger instead? It will help us to control the amount of msg in the console.
Example: https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/blob/2f295ea91cdd97ff37eb5d164fc63014ea718bc7/test/functional/Jsr335/src/org/openj9/test/jsr335/defineAnonClass/BasicClass.java#L37

timeline.bodyText:
We have msg for start and finish. Additional msg for start and finish may not be needed.

timeline.message:
Add DupClassNameTest

Add a test that there are 2 different classes with the 
same name loaded by 2 different class loaders.

Signed-off-by: Hang Shao <hangshao@ca.ibm.com>

Add DupClassNameTest

Add a test that there are 2 different classes with the 
same name loaded by 2 different class loaders.

Signed-off-by: Hang Shao <hangshao@ca.ibm.com>
